titles.title: Providing for the consideration of motions to suspend the rules.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-992, by Mrs. Myrick.

Providing for consideration of motions to suspend the rules on the following measures: H.R. 2780; H. Res. 605; H.R. 4541; H. Con. Res. 271; and H.R. 2592. House Resolutions 615 and 633 are laid on the table.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 316.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 640.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 10/18/2000--Introduced. Makes it in order at any time on October 19, 2000, for the Speaker of the House of Representatives to entertain motions that the House suspend the rules and pass or adopt specified measures.
